name: The Quest (itch) (olivieryc, bouergh)
description:
Innocence and naivete are the marks of the young. Imagination and ingenuity are their strengths. When a young boy discovers that there is a virtual reality beyond the real world, his curiosity compels him to brave the mysterious dangers beyond the veil. Armed with his very own pair of 3D glasses, our hero takes the first step towards glory by simulating his own fun!

Controls:

Press [<-] to move left.

Press [->] to move right.

Press [ALT] to wear or remove the 3D Glasses.

Press [CTRL] to interact with an object.

Instructions:

The aim of the game is to unlock the treasures of the virtual world.

Identify the perils of your virtual reality and find clever solutions in the real world.
